subject: Economy
question_en: What is the role of self-employment in rural development?
question_hi: स्वस्थित काम के रोजगार के क्या हैंदी विकास के मूल्य क्या है।
C_hi: सहायता करना गणतिकारणक समानता का प्रयोग
explanation_en: Providing employment opportunities in rural areas helps in improving the overall development of the region.
explanation_hi: राजमंदिक करने का अधिकारी, राजमंदिक विकारी
explanation_en: Providing employment opportunities in rural areas helps in improving the overall development of the region.
explanation_hi: राजमंदिक करने का अधिकारी, राजमंदिक विकारी

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary objective of the National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (NREG)? What is its significance in the context of rural development?
A_en: The main objective of NREG is to provide employment opportunities to rural individuals and families. In the context of rural development, it plays a significant role by reducing rural unemployment and promoting self-employment.
A_hi: NREGS का मुद्र सवालना है राजमंदिक कारणकारी, राजमंदिक विकारी
C_en: RURAL EMPLOYMENT GUARANTEE SCHEME (REGS) is a flagship program of the central government. In the context of rural development, it helps by providing employment opportunities to rural individuals and families.
D_en: RGE (Rural Guarantee Employment) scheme is aimed at improving the living standard of rural people.
E_en: The scheme provides employment to rural individuals through skill-based training and employment opportunities.
F_en: The scheme has a significant impact on reducing poverty and increasing income levels in rural areas.
G_en: It aims to uplift the rural people by providing them with self-employment opportunities.
H_en: The scheme ensures sustainable development in rural areas by promoting entrepreneurship and self-employment.
I_en: By providing skill-based training, the scheme contributes towards rural development.
J_en: Focusing on skill development, the scheme plays a vital role in reducing unemployment.
K_en: The scheme provides employment opportunities for rural youth.
L_en: Rajasthan government has launched the scheme to promote rural entrepreneurship.
M_en: Under the scheme, villagers can start their own business.
N_en: The scheme helps in reducing rural poverty.
Q_en: What is the role of NREGS (National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme)?
R_en: How does NREGS contribute towards rural development?
U_en: What is the role of NREGS in rural development?
